definition: lawless/illegal/unlawful
(negative prefix)/not/no
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
lawbreakers/offenders

sentences.english: Knew that the carnival games had been gaffed .
sentences.chinese: 知道這些慶祝的表演競賽已被不法之徒所操縱。

sentences.english: Many thought they were heroes while others called them lawless renegades.
sentences.chinese: 許多人認爲他們是英雄，而其他人叫他們不法叛徒。

sentences.english: The crime of misappropriation is an act of turning a holding into an illegal possession.
sentences.chinese: 侵佔罪是易佔有爲不法所有的行爲。

sentences.english: I still cannot forget the cold winter, when you took me to the keyboard class.
sentences.chinese: 至今我也不法忘記你帶我學電子琴的那個寒冷的冬天。

sentences.english: Before we can clean up this city, we must arrest the main squeeze .
sentences.chinese: 要清除這座城市的不法之徒，先得逮捕他們的頭目。

sentences.english: The scavengers aren't wasting any time.
sentences.chinese: 那些不法之徒是不會浪費任何時間的。

sentences.english: The pusher, not qualified products to sell fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 致使不法商販渾水摸魚，出售不合格產品。

sentences.english: So far, he has not been charged with any crime.
sentences.chinese: 目前，他還沒有因任何不法行爲受到起訴。

sentences.english: The unlawful trader cheated the consumers by selling them fake and inferior commodities.
sentences.chinese: 這個不法商人銷售僞劣商品坑騙消費者。

sentences.english: A number of unruly youth ganged up and terrorized the district.
sentences.chinese: 一些不法青年結成一夥，使這個地區充滿恐怖。
吉布森極力否認有不法行爲。

sentences.english: I'm being genuinely serious, Twilight fans, punish them.
sentences.chinese: 我很認真，粉絲們，這些不法分子必須得到懲罰。

sentences.english: If someone misbehaves, hiding behind a pseudonym does not protect [them].
sentences.chinese: 如果有人有不法行爲的話，假名保護不了他們。

sentences.english: The scope of the actualizing action.
Chapter 4 researches the criteria of the illegal infringement.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，不法侵害的基準。

sentences.english: He struggled with illegal foreign businessmen persistently to protect nation's interests.
sentences.chinese: 爲了保護民族利權，還與不法外商進行了不懈的鬥爭。

definition: to gain profit (by underhand means)/to exploit/exploitation
to gain profit (by underhand means)/to exploit/see also 謀取|谋取[mou2 qu3]
to profiteer/profiteering
to cheat/to swindle
to fabricate excuses (idiom)/to concoct various items (e.g. to pad an expense account)
to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)
extortion and blackmail (idiom)
to gain from corrupt dealing/to engage in graft/to feather one's nest
to accumulate wealth/to rake in money
to steal sth and sell it
to impersonate/to pose as (someone else)/to counterfeit/to palm off (a fake as a genuine)
to stuff one's pockets/to take bribes
to continue despite repeated prohibition (idiom)
to swindle/to defraud
to feign/to pretend to be/to pass oneself off as
